# Central Coast {#cc}

Here is the information available for steelhead CUs in the Central Coast region. Steelhead CUs in this region were defined in [Parkinson et al. 2005](https://salmonwatersheds.ca/library/lib_521/).

![Map of the Central Coast region of the Pacific Salmon Explorer and steelhead monitoring sites](_bookdown_files/map_cc_monitoring.png)


## *North Coast Summer*

CU id: 681

### Populations 

```{r echo=FALSE}
cu_list <- read.csv("_bookdown_files/steelhead_cu_population_lookup_2022.csv")


cu_list[ (cu_list$cu_id %in% c("681")), c(3,4,11)]

```

### Spawner Surveys 

_Historical spawner survey data are published for the Bella Coola River (English et al. 1999, [Ptolemy et al. 2006](https://a100.gov.bc.ca/pub/acat/documents/r8340/BellaFinalSTHD_1165528596401_62d306f669ce4c39a9acd8471f8445f2.pdf)). Pending extraction from PDF reports._

### Juvenile Surveys
